inclusion.criterion: Recruitment via direct contact from patient population
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Randomization to use estrogen cream or placebo
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants will be provided with medication in prepackaged syringes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Study participants will return for follow-up appointments at 2 weeks, 6 weeks, 12 weeks and 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Vaginal culture will be obtained at any visit if the patient complains of a bothersome, malodorous discharge
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Questionnaires will be completed at baseline, 12 week and 6 month
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participant reports not using the cream or returning syringes unused
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Participant develops or has a new diagnosis of any conditions that are reactions/adverse events occur from the use of Estrace or placebo
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 16-year-old girl recently diagnosed with myasthenia gravis. She has diplopia and weakness affecting her upper extremities, but she does not smoke or use illicit drugs.
